name: my-ip
title: My Ip
description: Get your IPV4 or IPV6, and copy to your clipboard
author: Sn0wye

commands.name: get-ipv4
commands.title: Get Ipv4
commands.description: Get your IPv4, and copy to clipboard

commands.name: get-ipv6
commands.title: Get Ipv6
commands.description: Get your IPV6, and copy to clipboard

commands.name: get-public-ipv4
commands.title: Get Public Ipv4
commands.description: Get your Public IPv4, and copy to clipboard

commands.name: get-public-ipv6
commands.title: Get Public Ipv6
commands.description: Get your Public IPv6, and copy to clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
